Summary: LOOKED UP SAW 5 LIGHTS MOVING VERY SLOW IN PERFECT DISTANCE
divs: Sighting DetailsLET THE DOG OUT AND I LOOKED UP THE BECAUSE THE STARS WERE SO BEAUTIFUL AND I SAW 6 LIGHTS IN A PERFECT HORIZONTAL LINE FORMATION MOVING TO THE SOUTH VERY SLOWLY ,AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS A BLIMP OR SOMETHING BUT THE THEY BEGAN TO PULSESATE RED AND WHITE IN A ROW ONE RIGHT AFTER ANOTHER .
